name: KiLL SanTa (itch)
description:
This game is where you want to kill santa because he is a mean person when you are on his naughty list. WASD to move. They way you is you need to press on red pressure plates to drop santa down to his fate. Santa will move slowly down the map and you only have a few chances to be able to take him down.

TIP: Activate the pressure plate before santa comes otherwise he wont fall down the hole. The activated hole exists for 0.3 seconds so be careful for your timing.

Another TIP: You can see where the hole is going to be by a slight half-invisible small block close to each pressure plate.
